name: @eka-care/ekascribe-ts-sdk-legacy
description: EkaScribe TypeScript SDK - ES6/ES2015 build with polyfills for legacy browser support
author: Sanikagoyal28 <sanikagoyal9@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn clean && node build.mjs && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly && cp -R ../../eka-sdk/ekascribe-v2rx/shared-worker dist
